MediaEntry¶

class Sakurajima.models.media.MediaEntry(data_dict, network)¶

Represents a single media entry and contains all the relevant data related to the entry like media_id and favorite status.

favorite_media()¶

Marks the media as favorite.

Returns

True if the operation is successful, False if an error occured.

Return type

bool

favorites¶

The number of users who have favorited the media.

id¶

The ID of the media.

is_favorited¶

If the user has favorited the media.

thumbnail¶

The url to the thumbnail of the media.

title¶

The title of the media.

type¶

The type of the media, example opening, ending etc
